text: La Grande-Béroche is a municipality of the district of Boudry in the canton of Neuchâtel in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2018, when the former municipalities of Bevaix, Fresens, Gorgier, Montalchez, Saint-Aubin-Sauges and Vaumarcus merged to form the new municipality.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 27 April 2016 == References == Category:Municipalities in Boudry Category:2010s establishments in Switzerland Category:2018 establishments in Europe
title: La Grande-Béroche
